name: Derek Acorah's Spook Manor
description:
Overview

Welcome to Derek Acorah's brand new ghost hunting TV show, Spook Manor!

Join Derek as he attempts to channel the spirits and communicate with the afterlife on live TV!

What Do?

As Derek's hapless assistant you must protect the famous psychic who has unwittingly summoned the forces of evil.

Bust some ghosts, collect ectoplasm and build defenses to keep the show going.

Controls

Protect your phony TV psychic boss who's doesn't realise he's not really a phony!

  • Move left and right - A, D
  • Jump - Space
  • Left Mouse Button - Shoot
  • Press W on the magic circles then A and D to scroll then E to purchase and summon turrets.

Collect ectoplasm from the ghosts!
